name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.
background: Positions the work in a context by presenting related work and introducing aesthetic or scientific theories related to the work.

name: Retro Rainbow
description: The purpose of this piece was for me to get back into coding and using javascript and p5, as I have not used it in a long time.
background: Whilst this is somewhat of a basic project, I still tried to give it a nice look. The shapes are inspired by various projects I found online, and the color palette was found on https://www.color-hex.com/color-palette/71344. I choose this palette because it has a very nice retro feel, which I really enjoy.

name: Bouncy Balls
description: I was inspired by one of Garrits examples. I played around with values to learn the meaning of the code, and then I added more features to make the finished piece match my vision for the project.
background: Positions the work in a context by presenting related work and introducing aesthetic or scientific theories related to the work.
